content.full_text: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Self, 24 November 18551 Springfield Marine and Fire Insurance Co., Pay toSelfor Bearer, Thirty Sevenx/100Dollars In Current Bank Bills.
paragraphs: Check of Abraham Lincoln to Self, 24 November 18551 Springfield Marine and Fire Insurance Co., Pay toSelfor Bearer, Thirty Sevenx/100Dollars In Current Bank Bills.
citations: The Lincoln Log: A Daily Chronology of the Life of Abraham Lincoln, 24 November 1855,http://www.thelincolnlog.org/Results.aspx?type=CalendarDay&day=1855-11-24.

footnotes.text:
1An unknown person filled in the blanks of this partially printed check and Abraham
                  Lincoln signed it.

2The ledger of the Springfield Marine & Fire Insurance Company records Lincoln’s withdrawal
                  of $37 from his account on this date. Lincoln’s intent for these funds is unknown.The Lincoln Log: A Daily Chronology of the Life of Abraham Lincoln, 24 November 1855,http://www.thelincolnlog.org/Results.aspx?type=CalendarDay&day=1855-11-24.
